# Follower


```{r}
# devtools::install_github("systats/deeplyr")
# features <- simon$con %>% get_users() %>% 
#   select(follow, contains("count"))
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, keras)
load("features.Rdata")

mparams <- list(
  output_dim = 1
)

library(deeplyr)
jo <- learner$new("xgboost:binary")
jo$set_param(mparams)
jo$set_data(x = features[,-1], y = features$follow)
jo$set_split()
jo$train()
jo$test(dev = F)

jo$eval$preds
jo$eval$plots
jo$eval$perform
```
